attributes.action: estore Buckingham Palace owing its importance to the tourist industry and nation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our history and identity are being eroded in the same way as this important building. This is not a lifestyle choice of our Queen but it often represents the first impression of our country by visitors and dignitaries alike. I am sure something would be done if a head of state was killed by flying masonry should we wait that long?

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
